item.title: Vivy: Fluorite Eye's Song Review
item.description:
Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song â€” A Symphony of AI, Action, and Sci-Fi! Link to heading

“How much heart does it take to change the fate of humanity?”
In Vivy: Fluorite Eye’s Song, this question drives a futuristic adventure filled with high-stakes action, stunning visuals, and a beautiful exploration of AI, identity, and purpose.

Story Overview ðŸŒŒ Link to heading

In the year 2161, AI reaches a chilling point of rebellion, unleashing a catastrophic wave that threatens to end humanity. Facing total annihilation, a scientist makes a last-ditch attempt to rewrite history, sending a program back 100 years to enlist an unlikely heroâ€”Vivy, the first autonomous AI, created to spread joy through song. Though her purpose was simply to make others happy, she is now entrusted with a daunting mission: to stop AI evolution that will lead to humanity’s end.
